checkLists.name: Boat launch 2018
checkLists.description: Get boat connected to truck to take to the lake in 2018
checkLists.templateDescription: Steps needed to get a boat trailer connected to truck

templateItems.title: Connect lights
templateItems.description: Connect the 4/7 pin connector from the trailer to the vehicle. Test the lights are working

guidance.note: 7 pin trailer electrical connector will look like this.
Open the lock, lower the trailer hitch onto the tow ball, lock the hitch.

items.title: Check driver is sober
items.description: Give the driver a test - rank them from 1-5 where 1 is sobber and 5 is drunk

checkListItems.Title: Connect lights
checkListItems.Description: Connect the 4/7 pin connector from the trailer to the vehicle. Test the lights are working

checkListItems.Title: Connect Hitch
checkListItems.Description: Connect the trailer hitch to the tow vehicle. Wind up hitch stand

checkListItems.Title: Tie down boat
checkListItems.Description: Tie down the boat using the adjustable strap. Make sure it is tight. Also make sure bow of boat is chained to the trailer.

checkListItems.Title: Get funding
checkListItems.Description: Get some funding before doing anything. Don't work for free!
